summary: Completed testing of Hogwarts Music Studio new CMS features. Backend APIs for Services Page and About Page CMS fields are working correctly (100% success rate). Frontend displays dynamic content properly. However, Admin Content tab navigation has routing issues preventing access to the Content Management interface.

minor_issues.issue: Services Page and About Page CMS fields were missing from default content
minor_issues.impact: New CMS fields were not available initially
minor_issues.root_cause: Default content in backend didn't include the new fields added by main agent
minor_issues.resolution: Added missing fields via API calls during testing

integration_issues.issue: Content tab in admin sidebar doesn't navigate to Content Management page
integration_issues.impact: Admin cannot access Services Page and About Page CMS sections through UI

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix Admin Content tab routing issue. The Content Management component exists and has all required Services Page and About Page sections with proper fields, but the admin sidebar Content link doesn't navigate to /admin/content properly. Check routing configuration in AdminDashboard.js.
